sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { useState } from "react"; import "../App.css"; const Navbar = () => { const [location, setLocation] = useState("New Delhi"); const [isOpen , setIsOpen] = useState(false); const [resString, setResString] = useState({ location: { name: "London", region: "City of London, Greater London", country: "United Kingdom", lat: 51.52, lon: -0.11, tz_id: "Europe/London", localtime_epoch: 1697898045, localtime: "2023-10-21 15:20", }, current: { last_updated_epoch: 1697897700, last_updated: "2023-10-21 15:15", temp_c: 16.0, temp_f: 60.8, is_day: 1, condition: { text: "Light rain shower", icon: "//cdn.weatherapi.com/weather/64x64/day/353.png", code: 1240, }, wind_mph: 3.8, wind_kph: 6.1, wind_degree: 300, wind_dir: "WNW", pressure_mb: 984.0, pressure_in: 29.06, precip_mm: 0.1, precip_in: 0.0, humidity: 82, cloud: 75, feelslike_c: 16.0, feelslike_f: 60.8, vis_km: 10.0, vis_miles: 6.0, uv: 3.0, gust_mph: 11.9, gust_kph: 19.1, air_quality: { co: 237.0, no2: 14.1, o3: 63.7, so2: 7.5, pm2_5: 1.6, pm10: 2.3, "us-epa-index": 1, "gb-defra-index": 1, }, }, }); const apiKey = "69cd96ec13c844d487674304232110"; const url = `https://api.weatherapi.com/v1/current.json?key=${apiKey}&q=${location}&aqi=yes`; const gotData = async () => { try { let res = await fetch(url); let data = await res.json(); setResString(data); } catch (e) { console.log(e); } }; function updateLocation(e) { setLocation(e.target.value); } return (

{resString.location.name},

{resString.location.country}

latitude : {resString.location.lat}
longitude : {resString.location.lon}
timezone : {resString.location.tz_id}
time : {resString.location.localtime}

Forecast

condition : {resString.current.condition.text}

Last updated : {resString.current.last_updated}

Temperature

Temperature : {resString.current.temp_c} C or{" "} {resString.current.temp_f} F
Wind Speed : {resString.current.wind_kph} Kph or{" "} {resString.current.wind_mph} Mph
humidity : {resString.current.humidity}
cloud : {resString.current.cloud}
UV : {resString.current.uv}

Last updated : {resString.current.last_updated}

Air Quality

PM(2.5) : {resString.current.air_quality.pm2_5}
PM(10) : {resString.current.air_quality.pm10}
SO2 : {resString.current.air_quality.so2}
O3 : {resString.current.air_quality.o3}
CO : {resString.current.air_quality.co}
NO2 : {resString.current.air_quality.no2}

Last updated : {resString.current.last_updated}
); }; export default Navbar;
